All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Building
    Class used by checkAreaGivenId(int) Required to properly parse JSON input from POST request
    BuildingComponent
    Corresponds to the Component interface in Composite pattern There are two versions of each method, the REST controller uses only parameterless versions.
    BuildingController
    This class serves as the REST controller for our application
    CompositeBuildingComponent  
    ElementaryBuildingComponent
    Represents Leaf in Composite design pattern In our case it refers only to the room, since room is the only leaf structure in our model
    Floor
    Class used by Building(java.lang.String, int, java.util.ArrayList) Required to properly parse JSON input from POST request
    HeatVisitor
    Used to get the information about rooms in the building that exceed a certain level of heat consumption / m^3 given as a parameter to find places for improvement in the infrastructure Implements two versions of looking for information, tailored for different Component classes
    IdVisitor
    Class used to traverse the structure of the building in order to find the component with a given ID
    PutSeBuildingInfoApplication
    The main class of the application, sets up the Spring server
    Room
    Class used by Floor(java.lang.String, int, java.util.ArrayList) Required to properly parse JSON input from POST request
    Visitor
    Corresponds to the Visitor interface from the Visitor pattern defines two different implementations of visiting the BuildingComponent objects
